titleStmt.title: George Morgan plaintife [brace] William Megges, Richard Bowdler, William Turner, Thomas Ihones, Sir Iohn Bourcher, William Essington, and Robert Barlow ... defendants
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Chancery.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).

Reproduction of original in the British Library.
